metadata.synopsis: One of the guards standing next to the torture. He's mean (and a cannibal).

0.speaker: Lookout Grush
0.text: I'm watchin' ya. Spike promised that any meat that falls off is mine.
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: He's standing a few paces away from the prisoner.NodeContext: Mean.

1.speaker: Lookout Grush
1.text: Keep yer mitts off the prisoner. 'E's mine. MINE.
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: He's standing a few paces away from the prisoner.NodeContext: disgruntled and a little crazy. He didn't actually see you do anything, but he's suspicious.

2.speaker: Lookout Grush
2.text: Ya didn't touch my prisoner, didya? 'E's mine. Mine!
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: He might not be standing next to the prisoner anymore.NodeContext: disgruntled and a little crazy. He didn't actually see you do anything, but he's suspicious.
